chat_history.name: search

chat_history.content: Out of the top 5 Formula 1 drivers with the most race wins, the only driver born before 1990 is Ayrton Senna. He was born in Brazil and achieved significant success in Formula 1, winning multiple races during his career.

functions.name: search
functions.desc: Search Wikipedia for an article with the given title, and get its content. If no such article is found, return similar article names.
